parameterdescription.para: Distance threshold for clustering.
Density threshold for clustering
Minimum distance between clusters. This parameter is optional and by default dc is used.

Number of points per bin, used to determine the tile size

memberdef.name: make_clusters

briefdescription.para: Construct the clusters from host points.

parameterdescription.para: The type of convolutional kernel to use
The type of distance metric to use
The queue to use for the device operations
Host points to cluster
The distance metric to use for clustering, default is EuclideanMetric
The convolutional kernel to use for computing the local densities, default is FlatKernel with height 0.5
The size of the blocks to use for clustering, default is 256

briefdescription.para: Construct the clusters from batched host and device points.

parameterdescription.para: The type of convolutional kernel to use
The type of distance metric to use
The queue to use for the device operations
Host points to cluster
Device points to cluster
Sizes of each batch item
The distance metric to use for clustering, default is EuclideanMetric
The convolutional kernel to use for computing the local densities, default is FlatKernel with height 0.5
The size of the blocks to use for clustering, default is 256

simplesect.para: The total size of h_points and dev_points must be equal to the sum of batch_item_sizes

briefdescription.para: The Clusterer class is the interface for running the clustering algorithm. It provides methods to set up the clustering parameters, initializes the internal buffers and runs the clustering algorithm on host or device points.

parameterdescription.para: The number of dimensions of the points to cluster
